title: Extras - series 2
description:
The second series of the comedy show Extras, with Ricky Gervais.

The second series sees Andy Millman (Ricky Gervais) experiencing the highs he has longed for with his newly written sitcom, &#039;When The Whistle Blows&#039;. However, while the show achieves high ratings, Andy&#039;s creative integrity is under threat from the catchphrase-riddled, mainstream appeal of it all.

The answer; artistic credibility and celebrity friends, which leaves poor Maggie out in the cold, now working as a background artist on Andy&#039;s breakthrough venture.

As before, a slew of high-profile celebrities pop up for some hilarious cameos, including Sir Ian McKellen, Robert De Niro and Orlando Bloom amongst others, all willing and able to humiliate themselves!
